comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/29050464@N06] You're welcome! THe Queenslander coloured covers are one of our favourite digitised collections. There's only a small sample here of the total nearly 1000 in the collection. Should we add more?
